headline: Should You Invest in TJX (TJX) Based on Bullish Wall Street Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), TJX (TJX) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Assessing Whether TJX Companies (TJX) Looks Undervalued After Strong Multi Year Shareholder Returns
summary: Why TJX Companies (TJX) is on investors’ radar today TJX Companies (TJX) continues to attract attention after recent share price moves, with the stock showing mixed near term returns and stronger performance over the past year compared with shorter timeframes. With a last close of US$153.24, TJX sits between a modest month decline and a gain over the past 3 months, while longer term total returns over 1, 3 and 5 years reflect sustained compounding for shareholders. For investors trying to...
